document_data.name: Rhammas Thann
document_data.mainbody: '''Rhammas Thann''' was a noble of [[Waterdeep]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was the husband of [[Cassandra Thann]] and thus the patriarch of the [[Thann]] family, although in his later years, he retired from an active role in family affairs.
document_data.Personality:
He was a hardworking and honorable man who was overshadowed by his wife, Cassandra. 

His son, [[Danilo Thann]], remarked several times that Rhammas in particular disapproved of him and his foolishness.
document_data.History: In [[1315 DR]], Rhammas convinced his father, [[Erktos I]], to stop the family's involvement in the slave trade.
document_data.Relationships:
Rhammas was the eldest son of Erktos I.

He once had an out-of-wedlock daughter named [[Lilly]], who was killed by the [[Knights of the Shield]].
